thread.section_title: Buddy Allen Carpet One Floor & Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Buddy Allen Carpet One Floor & Home | www.buddyallencarpetonenashville.com
thread.title: Becky T
thread.title_full: Buddy Allen Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Becky T

author: Becky T
title: Becky T
text: The entire process from the selection of the carpet to the installation was a pleasant and very satisfying experience! Everyone associated with Buddy Allen Carpet was kind, friendly, and helpful! I'm considering a different floor in my great room and Buddy Allen will definitely get my business! I highly recommend them to anyone needing any flooring needs!!
